long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get instant answers to your math expressions and unit conversions with the Math Expression Evaluator and Unit Converter extension for Chrome. Simply enter or copy paste any math expression on the popup window and 'Evaluate to see the result. The extension supports a wide range of mathematical functions and unit conversions, making it a valuable tool for students, engineers, and scientists alike. Download now to make solving math and unit conversion problems a breeze!"
This tool is initially made for my daughter to evaluate the mathematical expressions in her school.
